author: clement
msg: Add the iPOJO Pom file containing all iPOJO modules.

author: jorton
msg: * configure.in, Makefile.in: Define the libtool versioning hint in the
Makefile rather than hard-coding in the (shared) apr_rules.mk.

author: gatfora
msg: Undo changes made to SenderWorker as this breaks the Sandesha unit tests.  The particular case broken is when a sync ack is sent on an Async request/response, the OpContext was being completed so no async response would ever be sent

author: hlship
msg: Add a bamboo profile to allow fast deployment of snapshots locally, on tapestry.formos.com, as part of a nightly build.
